stripped_text: Whenever a successful run on R&D ends, you may place 1 virus counter on this program. click: Run R&D. If successful, access X additional cards when you breach R&D. X is equal to the number of hosted virus counters.
text: Whenever a successful run on R&D ends, you may place 1 virus counter on this program. [click]: Run R&D. If successful, access X additional cards when you breach R&D. X is equal to the number of hosted virus counters.
title: Conduit
